title: ishaiyil negizum
sahitya:
isaiyil negizhum jagadIshanE

rishabhapriyanE mAhEshanE  

anupallavi  

disai mARit tirindiDum mAndar tam uLmana

asaivay nErniRutti, sIr seydinbam tanda  

caraNam

kumuda malar nANum vadananE

amudinai minjciDum sollin selvanE

imai enakkAttaruLum iRaivanE (bhaktar)

sumaidanai kuRaittiDum guNA nidhiyE
